code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'./AuthContext';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const{login}=useAuth();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setLoading(true);setError('');try{const user=await login(email,password);if(user.role==='admin'||user.role==='manager'){navigate('/admindashboard');}else{navigate('/dashboard');}}catch(err){setError('Invalid credentials.
